TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract WorkflowInstance extends System.Object

summary.span: 是以每個執行個體皆具備的輕量執行階段，用於執行工作流程程式。

span.span: is a lightweight, per-instance runtime for executing a workflow program.

summary.span: 此項目可用來建立新的工作流程執行個體，或從現有的執行個體狀態建立。

span.span: It can be constructed to create a new workflow instance or from existing instance state.

summary.span: 所公開的 API 是一組最小的執行階段控制項，透過這些控制項即可實作較高階的作業。

span.span: The APIs that exposes are the minimal set of runtime controls from which higher level operations can be implemented.

summary.span: 這個 API 集代表執行階段的整個功能範圍。

span.span: This API set represents the entire breadth of functionality of the runtime.

summary.span: is an abstract class and relies on a host’s implementation of its abstract methods in order to provide host functionality such as synchronization, persistence, tracking, and extensions.

span.span: is an abstract class and relies on a host’s implementation of its abstract methods in order to provide host functionality such as synchronization, persistence, tracking, and extensions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是單一執行緒，並且假設主機會同步處理針對它進行的所有存取。 is single threaded and assumes that the host synchronizes all access to it. 嘗試同時呼叫多個 API，會導致擲回 。An attempt to call multiple APIs simultaneously will result in an being thrown. 內部具有兩種狀態：執行中與已暫停。Internally, a has two states: Running and Paused. 要使執行階段從已暫停轉換成執行中，唯一的方法便是呼叫 。The only way to cause the runtime to transition from paused to running is to call . 所有動作 (除了「暫停」) 都只能在執行階段處於「已暫停」狀態時進行。All actions (except Pause) can only be taken while the runtime is Paused. 在下列情況下，執行階段會自動暫停：The runtime will become spontaneously Paused in the following situations: - 執行階段發生嚴重錯誤。An error fatal to the runtime has occurred. 主機將透過 (不會發出轉換為「已暫停」的訊號) 收到訊號，然後透過 收到通知。The host will be signaled through (which does not signal a transition to Paused) and then notified through . - 此時無法攔截工作流程中的例外狀況，因此例外狀況會逸出根目錄。An exception in the workflow was uncaught and escaped the root. 主機將透過 方法收到通知。The host will be notified through the method. - 排程器已用盡工作項目，現在正處於 狀態。The scheduler has run out of work items and is now . 主機將透過 方法收到通知。The host will be notified through the method. 請注意，排程器用盡工作項目的原因，可能包括執行個體已閒置或執行個體已完成。Note that the scheduler could have run out of work items because the instance is idle or because the instance is complete. 屬性的 值可用於區別這兩種情況。The value of the property can be used to differentiate between the two. 主機可以透過呼叫 執行個體的 或 方法 (由 屬性傳回)，以要求從「執行中」變更為「已暫停」。The host can request a change from Running to Paused by calling the or methods of the instance returned by the property. 這項要求不表示主機不應嘗試利用特定的暫停呼叫來相互關聯 OnNotify\* 或 。This request should not be considered to have a specific response meaning that the host should not attempt to correlate an OnNotify\* or with a specific call to pause. 為回應暫停要求，執行階段可以在排程器仍具有暫止的工作項目時轉換成「已暫停」並呼叫 。In response to a pause request, the runtime may transition to Paused and call while the scheduler still has pending work items. 屬性的 值可用於判斷排程器是否沒有其他工作，或者已因暫停要求而中止。The value of the property can be used to determine whether the scheduler has no more work or was interrupted by a request to pause. 處於「執行中」狀態時，只能呼叫 執行個體的 方法 (由 屬性傳回)。The method of the instance returned by the property is the only method which can be called while the is in the Running state. 若呼叫所有其他方法，均會擲回 。基於 在不同狀態之間轉換的特定規則，「執行中」和「已暫停」的公用概念定義可如下所示：All other methods will throw an if called.Given the rules for how transitions from one state to another, the public notion of Running and Paused can be defined as follows: - 執行中 – 呼叫 與下一個 WorkflowInstance.OnNotify\* 之間的狀態。Running – The state between a call to and the next WorkflowInstance.OnNotify\*. - 已暫停 – 上一個 WorkflowInstance.OnNotify\* 與下一個 呼叫之間的狀態。Paused – The state between the last WorkflowInstance.OnNotify\* and the next call to .

summary.span: 由工作流程執行階段呼叫，以通知主機工作流程執行個體已從執行中狀態轉換成已暫停狀態。

span.span: Called by the workflow runtime to notify the host that the workflow instance has transitioned from the running state to the paused state.

Protected Friend MustOverride Sub OnRequestAbort (reason As Exception)
protected public: abstract void OnRequestAbort(Exception ^ reason);

param.name: reason
param.span: 中止工作流程執行個體的原因。

span.span: The reason for aborting the workflow instance.

summary.span: 由工作流程執行階段呼叫，以通知主機已要求工作流程執行個體中止作業。

span.span: Called by the workflow runtime to notify the host that an abort operation has been requested for the workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一旦呼叫 ，大多數 API ( 除外) 都會擲回 。Once is called, most APIs except will throw an . 預期呼叫 之後，主機的趨勢將朝向可以滿足中止的狀態。It is expected that after is called a host will trend toward a state in which it can satisfy the abort.

MemberSignature.Value: protected void RegisterExtensionManager (System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager extensionManager);
.method familyhidebysig instance void RegisterExtensionManager(class System.Activities.Hosting.WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager extensionManager) cil managed
Protected Sub RegisterExtensionManager (extensionManager As WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager)
protected: void RegisterExtensionManager(System::Activities::Hosting::WorkflowInstanceExtensionManager ^ extensionManager);

param.name: extensionManager
param.span: 要註冊的擴充管理員。

span.span: The extension manager to register.

summary.span: 由主機呼叫，以註冊指定的擴充管理員、驗證所有必要的擴充均存在，並且初始化要使用的擴充集合。

span.span: Called by the host to register the specified extension manager, validate that all required extensions are present, and to initialize the collection of extensions to be used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 擴充會以型別做為索引鍵，若主機提供了擴充，則一律使用主機所提供的擴充。Extensions are keyed by type, and a host provided extension will always be used if provided. 透過 加入的擴充會使用物件的執行階段型別做為型別索引鍵。Extensions added through use the runtime type of the object as the type key. 透過加入延伸模組提供者使用 func 的型別 T\ 做為型別索引鍵。Extensions providers added through use the decared type T of the Func\ as the type key. 如果已宣告型別的主機擴充存在，或者透過 AddDefaultExtensionProvider 提供了更廣泛的型別，則會卸除活動透過各種 \*ActivityMetadata.AddDefaultExtensionProvider 方法所提供的擴充提供者 (例如，Extension providers contributed by activities through the various \*ActivityMetadata.AddDefaultExtensionProvider methods are dropped if a host extension exists for the declared type or if there is a broader type provided through AddDefaultExtensionProvider (ex. 如果 Func\ 會提供和 Func\ 會提供僅 Func\ 將會保留)。if Func\ is provided and Func\ is provided, only Func\ will be kept). 如果集合中不具有活動所要求的擴充 (透過呼叫 \*ActivityMetadata.RequireExtension 表示)，則會擲回 。If an extension does not exist in the collection that is required by an activity (expressed by calling \*ActivityMetadata.RequireExtension) a is thrown.
